function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cessation of the World Trade Organisation (WTO) moratorium on custom duties for electronic transmissions","Impact":"Negative impact on local economies and SMEs/start-ups competing for Smart City infrastructure opportunities","Mitigation":"Advocate for the continuation of the moratorium or negotiate alternative trade agreements to support local economies","Technologies":"Trade negotiation platforms, economic impact assessment tools","People":"Local SMEs, start-ups","Owner":"Government trade representatives"},{"Description":"Increasing rate of transactions coupling data and financial","Impact":"Risk of security breaches and privacy issues in financial transactions","Mitigation":"Implement robust encryption and data protection measures, and improve cybersecurity protocols","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, data protection systems, cybersecurity solutions","People":"Financial institutions, data processors","Owner":"Cybersecurity experts, financial industry regulators"},{"Description":"Emergence of new market-based instruments riding on the Blockchain network","Impact":"Potential financial instability and lack of regulation in new market instruments","Mitigation":"Establish regulatory frameworks and oversight for Blockchain-based market instruments","Technologies":"Blockchain regulation tools, financial market monitoring systems","People":"Financial market participants, regulators","Owner":"Financial regulatory bodies"}]}
